meanings.definition: Marked by or composed of characters that are written down.
meanings.sent1: The teacher gave us a written test to complete.
meanings.sent2: The letter was written in blue ink.
meanings.sent3: I found a written note from a secret admirer in my locker.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were written all over her face.
meanings.sent5: The written instructions were clear and easy to follow.

meanings.sent1: The written agreement was signed by both parties.
meanings.sent2: She kept a written record of all her expenses.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a written confession in the suspect's pocket.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the cause was written in his daily journal.
meanings.sent5: The written contract outlined the terms of their partnership.

meanings.definition: Represented by symbols on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization left behind written records on stone tablets.
meanings.sent2: The map had written directions to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The written language of the tribe was intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent4: The code was written in a series of complex symbols.
meanings.sent5: The written symbols on the cave wall told a mysterious story.
